title: varalakSmi nIyE
sahitya:
varalakSmi nIyE vandaruLvAyE mangaLamE tarum pankaja mEl varum


anupallavi

  caraNa kamalam paNivOrkku ihaparam iraNDilum nirai inbam tarum shrI


caraNam   surapati bhramanum paNipada kamalE tiruppARk-kaDal
 vandAi tirumAl mArbamarndAi paradEvi ANDil orumuRai
 vandhAl pOdAdu aDimai manadilenrum ezhundaruL dEvi
